name: World History Quiz
description:
Howdy quizters! World History Quiz – Trivia Questions and Answers is a general history quiz with fun history trivia questions and some truly fun history facts. You sure don't know all the answers. Or do you? Test your knowledge with World History Quiz – Trivia Questions and Answers and challenge your friends and family to a world history quiz contest!

Playing a world history trivia quiz might get boring, but not with World History Quiz – Trivia Questions and Answers! With 150 general history questions and answers, you will read 150 super fun history facts you have never heard before. Do you know the answer to all the American history quiz questions? How about World War 2 quiz questions? You'll have to know the answers to history trivia questions from the period of ancient Egypt and the pyramids to Hiroshima, Nagasaki, Chernobyl and the Cold War in order to get the certificate of a true historian.

Accept the challenge, take this general history test called World History Quiz – Trivia Questions and Answers and find out how much you know about US history, World War 1 history, World War 2 history and many other aspects of the world's past. Have fun!


WORLD HISTORY QUIZ FEATURES

- WORLD HISTORY QUIZ IN 16 DIFFERENT LANGUAGES: Arabic, Bulgarian, Chinese, Croatian, English, French, German, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Turkish, Korean and Thai
- HINTS - if you get stuck on a certain question, hint can be of help OR you can
- SKIP QUESTION, lose one life and move to the next trivia question
- HEARTS are your lives, each incorrect answer is one heart less
- ASK A FRIEND for help if you run out of all hints
- CERTIFICATE - you get it once you answer all trivia quiz questions

Fun quick quizzes in general are a nice way to have a good time and learn something new. With so many trivia questions and answers + fun facts for each one of them, this World History Quiz is a must-have among the apps. With a possibility to answer quick quiz questions in all the languages you know, this general history is more interesting than ever! So get World History Quiz game and enjoy learning new stuff through quick trivia questions and answers!
